title: Where is the thesis statement located in an essay? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: It should be in the first paragraph of your essay, the introduction. You begin the introduction with something that will catch your reader’s attention about the topic and lead the reader to the thesis statement. However, this is not a hard and fast rule. Some experienced writers will make the argument for the thesis statement and lead the reader to the thesis statement in the concluding paragraph. I recommend the first method for class essays because the instructor will look for the thesis in the introduction.
